messages.title: IT’S A CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OR A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority or a hung parliament.

messages.title: Don’t risk five long years of Corbyn in charge

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Politicians promised to enact the referendum result and it's time to keep that promise. As your MP I have always voted to leave, as the electorate decided, with a deal that will make exit smooth and allow us to trade freely with Europe and the rest of the world in the future.

A Conservative government will keep the economy strong and increase funding for public services used by your family and mine. As your MP I have helped secure funding for a new railway station and secondary school in Kenilworth and a medical centre in Wellesbourne.

Since Conservatives came to office in 2010, we have reduced greenhouse gases by a quarter, increased the percentage of our electricity from renewable sources from 6% to 35.5% and cut the number of plastic bags in use by 25 billion.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists.
